display_long_description:
Welcome to Little Planet, a cozy VR sandbox where you are the Creator! You've been given a world born from your own wish—a canvas to shape, nurture, and call home. 🏡 It’s a relaxing space, designed for you to express yourself freely. 🎨
[media]
Shape your world from the ground up 🌱. Craft everything from cozy furniture to playful gadgets 🔨, then give your world a personal touch by customizing your creations with the perfect splash of color.
[media]
In Little Planet, your world is meant to be played in. Every item is an invitation for fun! Play a song on a piano 🎹, launch some fireworks 🎆, or ride the Ferris wheel 🎡. From whimsical toys to relaxing activities, discovery is around every corner. 
[media]
Your journey is yours to shape. You can enjoy a peaceful solo adventure, befriending the charming Planet Pals and uncovering their stories 📖. Or, invite friends to your world 💌 for unforgettable get-togethers, whether you're collaborating on a new creation or just dancing by the campfire. 🔥
[media]
Little Planet is a living world that grows with its community. 🚀We're always adding new features, items, and events based on your feedback. Start your incredible journey today. We can't wait to see what you create! ✨
[media]
Join our vibrant community and share your world on Discord!
➡️**discord.gg/littleplanet**
